resources.string: Seriously, thank you so much for using this app and helping this project. What I\'m building is pretty ambitious, and it will only work if I can collect lots of real-world data. Without you this project would be going nowhere, so I mean it when I say \'thank you\'!

Three volunteers will win a £20 Amazon voucher at the end of this project, and the more you scan, the better your odds! Tap \'Did I Win?\' in the app menu to check whether you\'re a winner. Full details: http://easymaps.markormesher.co.uk.

Tap the button at the top to start scanning whenever you\'re travelling on the London Underground; tap again to disable it when you finish your journey. The scanner will run in the background, so you don\'t need to keep the app open.
Don\'t worry if you forget to turn the scanner on before you start travelling! You can turn it on and off at any point, above ground or below.

When scanning is enabled, the app will record the IDs of WiFi networks visible to your device. This app also records an anonymous ID for your device, which cannot be traced back to you. That\'s all it collects - no location data, no personal data, and nothing that can identify you. You can check your ID by tapping \'Display User ID\' in the app menu.

If you want to stop taking part in this project, all you need to do is stop using the app (you can uninstall it too, if you want to). If you also want to withdraw the data that you\'ve generated so far, you can do so from the app menu.
You can contact me easily so from the app menu - just tap \'Contact Mark\'. If anything went wrong, tap \'Send Bug Report\' in the menu and I\'ll get it fixed!
King\'s College London University Research Ethics Committee Reference: LRU–16/17–3924.
Try closing the app and opening it again
Note: location services are required for access to low-level WiFi information; location is never recorded.
Your user ID was copied to your clipboard
The report was copied to your clipboard

Please feel free to send me questions, bug reports, suggestions, general comments, etc.

---
%s
The interval you choose below tells the app approximately how often to scan nearby WiFi networks. A lower number means more data points, but slightly higher battery usage.

Your data is completely anonymous and cannot be linked to you.

Tap \'Yes\' below to send your ID to the server, triggering deletion of your data within 48 hours. This cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to withdraw your data?
Your data will be deleted within 48 hours.
Sorry, that didn\'t work! Make sure you\'re online.
Enter the PIN below to enable super user mode:
You are in super user mode
Sorry, that\'s not a valid network
Sorry, that didn\'t work! Make sure you\'re online.

Looks like the results aren\'t out yet!

Winners should be announced in early-April, so sit tight!

Sorry, you weren\'t a winner!

But hey, winning isn\'t everything. You\'ve still been part of a project that could have huge impacts, and I really appreciate your help!

Congratulations, you\'re a winner! Well done!

Your Amazon gift code has been copied to your clipboard - make sure you paste it into a note or a blank message to keep it safe!
